title: Bloomberg Markets: Adviser Backs Dumping Mylan Board
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Adviser Backs Dumping Mylan Board
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Cynthia Koons Healthcare Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Mylan NV facing an increasing backlash over its handling of the EpiPen pricing controversy, as a top proxy adviser urged shareholders to oust the drugmaker’s board.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
